title: Particle motion from velocity graph part - c

content.question: Let a(t) be the car's acceleration at time t, in meters per second per second. For 0 < t < 24, write a piecewise-defined function for a(t).

frqParts.text: Let a(t) be the car's acceleration at time t, in meters per second per second. For 0 < t < 24, write a piecewise-defined function for a(t).

topic.text: 4.2: Straight-Line Motion - Connecting Position, Velocity, and Acceleration

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
